atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind’s `base`, `components`, `utilities`, and `screens` styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to. Valid layers are a base, components, and utilities.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: You can generate responsive, hover, focus, active, and other variants of your own utilities by wrapping their definitions in the @variants directive.
